=== Cross Team Meetings ===

The Core Apps developers get together regularly on a Hangout on Air. All Core Apps developers are welcome. Currently this happens at 12:00 UTC on Thursday. Drop by #ubuntu-on-air on freenode when the meeting is on to ask questions.

=== CoreApps-Specific IRC Meetings ===

Meeting records for the '''Ubuntu Phone Core Apps Project'''!

We hold weekly meetings with each core app team at the following times in #ubuntu-touch-meeting on Freenode IRC. Note the most recent meeting log in this table, and the archive is below.
